S0116.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0116.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S0116.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. UNDER 20 YEARS 2. 21 - 24 YEARS 3. 25 - 29 YEARS 4. 30 - 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS AND OVER 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED BEFORE JOING ARMY 3. MARRIED AFTER JOINING ARMY 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q4. ABOUT HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. LESS THAN SIX MONTHS 2. SIX MONTHS TO ONE YEAR 3. ONE YEAR TO 18 MONTHS 4. EIGHTEEN MONTHS TO TWO YEARS 5. OVER TWO YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q5. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL:  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL 3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. HAD SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q6. ABOUT HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE BRITISH ISLE?  1. THREE MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER THREE MONTHS BUT NOT OVER SIX MONTHS 3. SIX MONTHS TO ONE YEAR 4. ONE YEAR TO EIGHTEEN MONTHS 5. OVER EIGHTEEN MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q7. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF OF THE LAST EIGHT YEAR?  01. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 1 02. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 2 03. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 3 04. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 4 05. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 5 06. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 6 07. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 7 08. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 8 09. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 9 10. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 0 11. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF X 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.

S0116.Q8. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q9. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY OR SQUADRO?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT VERY PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0116.Q10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY OR SQUADRO?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q11. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY OR SQUADRON USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO THEIR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q12. HOW ABOUT YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 13A, 13B AND 13C NOT CODED.

S0116.Q14. DO YOU THINK EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO FIT YOU INTO THE JOB YOU ARE BEST SUITED FOR IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE 2. SOMEWHAT MORE COULD HAVE BEEN DONE 3. A LOT MORE COULD HAVE BEEN DONE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q15. IS MOST OF YOUR TIME ON DUTY SPENT DOING THINGS RELATED TO YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMEN?  1. YES, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON MY MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT 2. NO, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON OTHER DUTIES 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q16. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY MUCH DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q17. DID YOU EVER HAVE A CHANCE TO SAY WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY JOB YOU WOULD LIK?  1. YES, I HAD A CHANCE TO SAY AND GOT THE JOB I ASKED FOR 2. YES, I HAD A CHANCE TO SAY BUT DIDN'T GET THE JOB I ASKED FOR 3. NO, I NEVER HAD A CHANCE TO SAY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q18. DO YOU THINK YOUR ABILITIES AND PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE FIT YOU BETTER FOR SOME OTHER ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMEN?  1. YES, I WOULD FIT BETTER IN A DIFFERENT JOB 2. NO, I AM BEST FITTED FOR MY PRESENT JOB 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

S0116.Q21. DID YOU EVER GO TO AN ARMY SPECIALIST SCHOOL (SUCH AS COOK, AIRPLANE ENGINE MECHANIC, RADIO OPERATOR, TRUCK DRIVER, ETC.*)  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 21A NOT CODED.

S0116.Q22. IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE TRAINING YOU GOT AT THE SPECIALIST SCHOOL YOU WENT T?  1. DID NOT GO TO A SPECIALIST SCHOOL 2. I USE MY TRAINING ALL THE TIME 3. I USE MY TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 4. I USE MY TRAINING ABOUT HALF THE TIME 5. I HARDLY EVER USE MY TRAINING 6. I NEVER USE MY TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q23A. IF YOU WANTED TO LEARN SOME EDUCATIONAL SUBJECT, WHICH KIND OF COURSE WOULD YOU RATHER TAK?  1. A CORRESPONDENCE COURSE - THE INSTRUCTOR SENDS YOU THE LESSONS BY MAIL AND YOU SEND THEM BACK TO HIM BY MAIL TO BE CORRECTED 2. A SELF-TEACHING COURSE - YOU ARE GIVEN ALL THE BOOKS, TESTS AND OTHER THINGS YOU NEED AND YOU DO ALL THE STUDYING BY YOURSELF AND CORRECT YOUR OWN PAPERS 3. A CLASS - A GROUP TAKING THE SAME COURSE MEET TOGETHER AND AN INSTRUCTOR PRESENTS THE MATERIAL, LEADS DISCUSSIONS, GIVES ASSIGNMENTS AND TESTS 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q23B. WHAT KINDS OF SUBJECTS WOULD YOU PERSONALLY LIKE MOST TO TAKE UP IF THERE IS A TIME LAPSE BETWEEN THE TIME THE WAR IS OVER AND YOUR RETURN BACK INTO CIVILIAN LIF?  1. HIGH SCHOOL SUBJECTS 2. TRADE SCHOOL SUBJECTS 3. BUSINESS SCHOOL SUBJECTS 4. MILITARY SUBJECTS 5. COLLEGE SUBJECTS 6. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 23C NOT CODED.

S0116.Q23D. IF YOU TAKE ANY COURSES WHILE YOU ARE IN THE ARMY IS IT IMPORTANT THAT YOU GET CREDITS FOR THEM TOWARD SCHOOL OR COLLEGE GRADUATIO?  1. YES, IT IS IMPORTANT 2. NO, IT IS NOT IMPORTANT 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q24. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. WORKING 2. GOING TO SCHOOL 3. LOOKING FOR WORK 4. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU WERE WORKING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY, PLEASE ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ABOUT IT: X. QUESTIONS 24A, 24B AND 24C NOT CODED.
S0116.Q25. WAS THE KIND OF WORK YOU DESCRIBED ABOVE YOUR MAIN OCCUPATIO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 25A AND 25B NOT CODED.

S0116.Q26. IF YOU WANTED IT, AND COULD DO THE WORK, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD GET THE SAME JOB BACK YOU HAD BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. YES 2. NO 3. HAVE NO IDEA 4. I WASN'T WORKING BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 26A NOT CODED.

S0116.Q27. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE MOST TO DO AFTER YOU GET OUT OF THE ARM?  1. WORK AT A FULL-TIME JOB (EITHER FOR SELF OR OTHERS) 2. GO TO SCHOOL FULL-TIME 3. STAY IN THE ARMY 4. HAVE NO IDEA 5. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q28. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD WANT TO GO BACK TO THE SAME SORT OF THING YOU WERE DOING BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY (THAT IS, JOB, SCHOOL, ETC.*)  1. WOULD LIKE TO DO THE SAME SORT OF THING 2. WOULD LIKE TO DO SOMETHING ELSE 3. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 29 NOT CODED.

S0116.Q30. DO YOU THINK YOU NEED ANY KINDS OF TRAINING OR SCHOOLING IN ORDER TO GET INTO THE CIVILIAN WORK YOU EXPECT TO D?  1. YES, I NEED A GREAT DEAL OF TRAINING 2. YES, I NEED A LITTLE TRAINING 3. NO, I DO NOT NEED ANY TRAINING 4. I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I WILL DO AFTER I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 5. I PLAN ON STAYING IN THE ARMY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q31. HAVE YOU LEARNED ANY SKILLS OR TRADES IN THE ARMY WHICH YOU THINK YOU WILL USE IN THE CIVILIAN WORK YOU EXPECT TO D?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q32. DO YOU USE THE CIVILIAN TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE YOU HAD BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMEN?  1. YES, MOST OF THE TIME 2. YES, ONCE IN A WHILE 3. NO, NEVER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q33. HOW MANY YEARS WAS IT BETWEEN THE TIME YOU LEFT FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ONE YEAR OR LESS 2. OVER ONE YEAR UP TO TWO YEARS 3. OVER TWO YEARS UP TO FIVE YEARS 4. OVER FIVE YEARS 5. I CAME INTO THE ARMY RIGHT OUT OF SCHOOL 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q34. IF YOU WERE OFFERED A GOOD JOB WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JO?  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO TO SCHOOL, EVEN IF I HAD TO PAY MY OWN WAY 2. IF THE GOVERNMENT PAID ALL MY EXPENSES, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO TO SCHOOL, EVEN IF THE GOVERNMENT PAID ALL MY EXPENSES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q35. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WHICH WOULD YOU RATHER DO WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY, - GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR GO TO PART-TIME SCHOO?  1. I WOULD RATHER GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 2. I WOULD RATHER GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL 3. UNDECIDED 4. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN GOING TO SCHOOL AT ALL WHEN I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q36A....WHAT KIND OF SCHOOL WILL YOU GO T?  1. TRADE SCHOOL 2. BUSINESS SCHOOL 3. HIGH SCHOOL 4. COLLEGE (UNDERGRADUATE) 5. SOME OTHER KIND OF SCHOOL 6. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN GOING TO SCHOOL AT ALL WHEN I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 36B NOT CODED.

S0116.Q37. WERE YOU EVER THE PRESIDENT OR THE OFFICER IN CHARGE OF A CLUB, UNION, PROFESSIONAL, CIVIC OR OTHER ORGANIZATION BEFORE COMING INTO THE ARM?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 37A NOT CODED.
S0116.Q38A. WERE YOU EVER A MANAGER, FOREMAN, BOSS OR LABOR SUPERVISOR IN CHARGE OF OTHER WORKER?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 38B NOT CODED.

S0116.Q39. HAVE YOU EVER HAD ANY EXPERIENCE OR TRAINING AS A TEACHER BEFORE COMING INTO THE ARM?  1. HAVE HAD TEACHER TRAINING BUT NEVER TAUGHT 2. TAUGHT IN GRADE SCHOOLS 3. TAUGHT IN HIGH SCHOOL 4. TAUGHT IN UNIVERSITY OR COLLEGE 5. OTHER TEACHING 6. NONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0116.Q40. HAVE YOU HAD ANY EXPERIENCE AS A TEACHER OR INSTRUCTOR SINCE COMING INTO THE ARM?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q41. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY OR SQUADRON WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q42. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO AN ACTUAL BATTLE ZON?  1. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT JUST AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 2. I'M READY TO GO ANYTIME 3. I'D LIKE TO GO BEFORE IT'S OVER BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 4. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO I THINK I'LL DO ALRIGHT 5. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 6. NO OPINION 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q43. HOW SUCCESSFUL ARE YOUR OFFICERS IN GETTING WILLING AND WHOLEHEARTED COOPERATION FROM THE ME?  1. VERY SUCCESSFUL 2. FAIRLY SUCCESSFUL 3. NOT VERY SUCCESSFUL 4. UNSUCCESSFUL 5. NOT SURE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q44. DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS ARE INTERESTED IN YOUR PERSONAL WELFAR?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. FAIRLY INTERESTED 3. SLIGHTLY INTERESTED 4. THEY DON'T SEEM TO CARE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q45. HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS KNOW THEIR STUF?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q46. DO YOU FEEL THAT THOSE IN CHARGE OF YOUR WORK KNOW WHAT YOUR ABILITIES ARE AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA 2. THEY HAVE A FAIR IDEA 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT MY ABILITIES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q47. DO YOU FEEL THE MOST DESERVING MEN USUALLY GET THE BEST "BREAKS" IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. RARELY 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q48. IN YOUR OUTFIT WHEN A MAN BREAKS A RULE OR DISOBEYS AN ORDER DOES HE USUALLY GET WHAT HE HAS COMING TO HI?  1. HE GETS MUCH MORE THAN HE SHOULD 2. HE GETS SOMEWHAT MORE THAN HE SHOULD 3. HE GETS ABOUT WHAT HE SHOULD 4. HE GETS SOMEWHAT LESS THAN HE SHOULD 5. HE GETS MUCH LESS THAN HE SHOULD 6. UNDECIDED 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q49. WHEN YOU ARE GIVEN A JOB TO DO, ARE YOU TOLD ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JO?  1. ALWAYS TOLD ENOUGH 2. USUALLY TOLD ENOUGH 3. OFTEN NOT TOLD ENOUGH 4. ALMOST NEVER TOLD ENOUGH 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q50. ARE YOU USUALLY TOLD WHY THE THINGS YOU DO AND THE THINGS THAT ARE DONE IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE NECESSAR?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q51. DO TOO MANY OF THE THINGS YOU HAVE TO DO SEEM UNNECESSARY FOR MAKING YOUR OUTFIT OR THE ARMY RUN BETTE?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM SEEM NECESSARY 2. SOME, BUT NOT TOO MANY, SEEM UNNECESSARY 3. TOO MANY SEEM UNNECESSARY 4. FAR TOO MANY SEEM UNNECESSARY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q52. WHEN PROMOTIONS ARE MADE IN YOUR OUTFIT HOW OFTEN DO THEY GO TO THE MEN WHO DESERVE THEM MOS?  1. RARELY OR NEVER 2. SOMETIMES 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY 5. ALWAYS 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q53. ARE YOUR MESS FACILITIES AND FOOD ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCE?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 2. COULD BE A BIT BETTER 3. COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q54. ARE YOU GETTING ABOUT AS MUCH TIME OFF (FURLOUGHS AND PASSES) AS YOU SHOULD HAVE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCE?  1. ABOUT AS MUCH AS WE SHOULD HAVE 2. SHOULD HAVE A BIT MORE 3. SHOULD HAVE A LOT MORE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q55. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU YOURSELF HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q56. GENERALLY SPEAKING, WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU THINK MOST ENGLISH PEOPLE HAVE OF AMERICAN SOLDIER?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q57. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS TO THE FUTURE WELL-BEING OF THE UNITED STATES THAT AMERICAN SOLDIERS GET ALONG WELL WITH THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. NOT INMPORTANT AT ALL 2. SOMEWHAT IMPORTANT 3. QUITE IMPORTANT 4. VERY IMPORTANT 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q58. HOW MUCH DO THE THINGS THAT THIS WAR IS BEING FOUGHT OVER MEAN TO YOU PERSONALL?  1. THEY MEAN EVERYTHING TO ME 2. THEY MEAN QUITE A BIT TO ME 3. THEY DON'T MEAN VERY MUCH TO ME 4. NOT SURE WHETHER THEY MEAN ANYTHING TO ME OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER
S0116.Q59. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0116.Q60. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE IS NOW BEING DONE TO WIN THE WAR AS SOON AS POSSIBL?  1. I THINK ABOUT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE IS BEING DONE NOW 2. I THINK SOMEWHAT MORE COULD BE DONE 3. I THINK A LOT MORE COULD BE DONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0116.Q61A. HOW MANY "ARMY TALKS" DISCUSSION MEETINGS HAVE YOU ATTENDE?  1. ONE, TWO, OR THREE 2. FOUR, FIVE, OR SIX 3. SEVEN OR MORE 4. NONE 0. NO ANSWER I. IF "NONE", SKIP QUESTIONS 61B-61W:

S0116.Q61B. WHERE ARE YOUR "ARMY TALKS" USUALLY HEL?  1. IN A BARRACKS 2. IN A DAY ROOM OR CLASS ROOM 3. IN A MESS HALL 4. IN A THEATER OR GYMNASIUM 5. OTHER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61C. WHAT IS THE LENGTH OF THE USUAL "ARMY TALK" PERIOD IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. ABOUT 15 MINUTES 2. ABOUT 30 MINUTES 3. ABOUT 45 MINUTES 4. ABOUT ONE HOUR 5. ABOUT 1 1/2 HOURS 6. OVER 1 1/2 HOURS 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0116.Q61D. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE LENGTH OF THE "ARMY TALK" PERIOD IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. IT IS TOO LONG 2. IT IS ABOUT RIGHT 3. IT ISN'T LONG ENOUGH 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S0116.Q61E. ABOUT HOW MANY MEN ARE THERE USUALLY IN THE GROUP WHEN YOUR "ARMY TALK" IS HEL?  1. 25 OR LESS 2. 26 TO 50 3. 51 TO 100 4. 101 TO 150 5. 151 TO 200 6. OVER 200 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61F. DO YOU PERSONALLY FIND THESE "ARMY TALKS" DISCUSSION MEETINGS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. VERY MUCH WORTHWHILE 2. I THINK THEY WILL BE WORTHWHILE, BUT AM NOT SURE 3. I DOUBT IF THEY WILL BE WORTHWHILE 4. I THINK THEY ARE A WASTE OF TIME 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61G. IN YOUR OPINION ABOUT HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT REALLY GET ANY GOOD OUT OF THE "ARMY TALKS" MEETING?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. LESS THAN HALF 5. VERY FEW 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S0116.Q61H. WHEN THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT MENTION THE "ARMY TALKS" PROGRAM ARE THEIR COMMENTS USUALLY FAVORABLE OR UNFAVORABL?  1. THEIR COMMENTS ARE USUALLY FAVORABLE 2. THEIR COMMENTS ARE USUALLY UNFAVORABLE 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61I. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE CHOICE OF SUBJECTS FOR DISCUSSION SO FA? HAVE THEY BEEN GOOD TOPICS OR NO?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. VERY POOR 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 61J NOT CODED.
S0116.Q61K. HOW GOOD A JOB HAVE YOUR DISCUSSION LEADERS DONE SO FA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. VERY POOR 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61L. WHO USUALLY GIVES THE "ARMY TALKS" AND LEADS THE DISCUSSION IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. AN OFFICER ALWAYS 2. AN OFFICER USUALLY BUT OCCASIONALLY AN ENLISTED MAN 3. AN ENLISTED MAN USUALLY BUT OCCASIONALLY AN OFFICER 4. AN ENLISTED MAN ALWAYS 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0116.Q61M. WOULD YOU PREFER HAVING AN OFFICER OR A NON-COM AS A DISCUSSION LEADE?  1. AN OFFICER 2. A NON-COM 3. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 61N NOT CODED.
